external_games.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Journey in suburbs #1 Vol.2

name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Journey in suburbs #1 Vol.2
summary: When you start, wherever you are becomes the driver's seat! All aboard for a delightful train ride with simple controls! A journey by local rail through Gifu prefecture, located in the center of the Japanese archipelago. In the second volume, you'll drive from Minoshi Station to Minami Kariyasu Station. Enjoy powerful 3D visuals that give you a precious "driver's view of the scenery," captured thanks to railway company cooperation!
